title: Enthralled
description: Yes, Rowan and Ned are coming soon.  "If you don't tell me where Rowan is, I'll burn this place to the ground to find him." Fated mates, dark magic, whips, canes, bondage, a collared slave, and the master that would do anything for him. Rowan's also finally also going to learn what ginger is for because he can't keep his mouth shut as usual.
author: Julie Mannino
